heroes.name: Ajit
heroes.trait: Beholders - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Beholders or Evil Eyes for each level attained after 2nd level

heroes.name: Arlach
heroes.trait: Ballista - Increases the Attack and Defense skill of any Ballista for each level attained after 4th level

heroes.name: Dace
heroes.trait: Minotaurs - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Minotaur or Minotaur Kings for each level attained after 5th level

heroes.name: Gunnar
heroes.trait: Logistics - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Logistics skill percentage

heroes.name: Lorelei
heroes.trait: Harpies - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Harpies or Harpy Hags for each level attained after 2nd level

heroes.name: Shakti
heroes.trait: Troglodytes - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Troglodytes or Infernal Troglodytes for each level attained after 1st level

heroes.name: Synca
heroes.trait: Manticores - Increases the Attack and Defense skills of any Manticores or Scorpicores for each level attained after 6th level

heroes.name: Alamar
heroes.trait: Resurrection - Casts Resurrection with increased effect, based on his level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Darkstorm
heroes.trait: Stone Skin - Casts Stone Skin with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Deemer
heroes.trait: Meteor Shower - Casts Meteor Shower with increased effect, based on hero level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Geon
heroes.trait: Eagle Eye - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Eagle Eye skill percentage

heroes.name: Jaegar
heroes.trait: Mysticism - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Mysticism skill percentage

heroes.name: Jeddite
heroes.trait: Resurrection - Casts Resurrection with increased effect, based on his level compared to the level of the target unit (the bonus is greater when used on weaker units)

heroes.name: Malekith
heroes.trait: Sorcery - Receives a 5% per level bonus to Sorcery skill percentage
